channel.title: Markus Air Crafter 2.1
channel.description:
[center][b][size=20pt]Markus Air Crafter 2.1[/size][/b][/center]
This script will craft air runes at the air altar and bank at Falador East Bank
[b]Features[/b] Multiplayer, will switch players after a set number of loads and in case of an unsolvable random event Fully autocolor Nice walking using radialwalk and symbols Excellent altar finding on the MM using dynamic dtms Antirandoms Support for tiara and talisman Linked with the SRL stats sytem
[b]Instructions[/b] Download the script Fill in your players and the constants. Press run! For best peformance start logged out You need scar divi 3.05 or higher in order to run this.
Please post progress reports,

item.title: Markus Air Crafter 2.1
item.dc:creator: @markus92 markus92
item.description:
@markus92 wrote:

[center][size=20pt]Markus Air Crafter
2.1[/size][/center]

This script will craft air runes at the air altar and bank at Falador East Bank

Features
Multiplayer, will switch players after a set number of loads and in case of an unsolvable random event
Fully autocolor
Nice walking using radialwalk and symbols
Excellent altar finding on the MM using dynamic dtms
Antirandoms
Support for tiara and talisman
Linked with the SRL stats sytem

Instructions
Download the script
Fill in your players and the constants.
Press run!
For best peformance start logged out
You need scar divi 3.05 or higher in order to run this.

Please post progress reports,
